FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: The New Pioneers
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A faction that aims to constantly expand their borders. -10% settlement cost.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Mercenaries
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A faction whose populace has a large amount of past or current mercenaries within. +25% combat efficiency, +$10 worker cost.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Expert Craftsmen
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A faction with a large number of skilled craftsmen in their ranks. +25% production to apparel and weapons.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Argicultural Roots
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A faction with a strong argicultural background. +15% production to food and +20% to animals.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Researchers
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A faction constantly on the verge of developing new technology. +25% research production. +$5 worker cost.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Mining Guild
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A faction with a strong culture of miners in its history. +20% bonus to mining.
